archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.1.5d: d) determining whether software code that can exploit a new vulnerability (often referred to as a zero-day exploit) is publicly available, either as a proof of concept or in the form of malware
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
